dict.string: Your Heal spell has a 10% chance to cause 50% more healing.
Your Heal spell has a 10% chance to decrease your cast times by 25% for 5 seconds.
Your Heal Spell leaves an effect on its target reducing damage taken by 5% for 15 seconds.
Light Eternal heals for 20% less, but costs 20% less energy and casts 10% faster.
While Regrow is active on a target, that target takes 5% less damage.
Forked Heal targets have an effect placed on them that heals for 10% of the healing done by forked heal over 8 seconds.
While under the Ward of Ancients, allies are healed for a small amount each second.
Casting Greater Heal causes you to regenerate energy 50% faster for 10 seconds.
Purify now removes curses and poisons from your entire raid instead of just your target.
Whenever you heal an ally, that ally's damage is increased by 50% for 10 seconds.
Whenever you cast Purify, you deal a large amount of damage to your enemies
Whenever you cast your Heal spell, you strike all enemies for moderate damage.
All of your healing done is increased by 10% and all of your spell costs are reduced by 10%.
If an ally would die, instead it is healed to 30% of its maximum health. This effect can only occur once every 60 seconds.
Heal, Greater Heal, Forked Heal, and Light Eternal heal an additional random target for 20% of their healing.
